comments.body: A better test might be to spam many write calls against a larger buffer, but this is probably good enough for these purposes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +429,433 @@		wg.Add(2)
		go func() { defer wg.Done(); <-ch; w1.Write([]byte("hello")) }()
		go func() { defer wg.Done(); <-ch; w2.Write([]byte("world")) }()
		close(ch)
		wg.Wait()
